content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### Electricity Generator at position (x)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine (position x)
- Boiler (position y)
- Offshore Pump (position z)

### Copper Plate Mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position x1) and a Furnace at position (y1)
- Burner Mining Drill (position x2) and a Furnace at position (y2)
- Burner Mining Drill (position x3) and a Furnace at position (y3)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors regarding insufficient resources
- Check your inventory to ensure you have enough materials before attempting to craft or place structures. 

### Errors with furnace status
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients and fuel to operate effectively.
